```{r}
rm(list=ls())
```



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
read_excel()
```

```{r}
crops <- read_excel("Tabela_Geral_1.xlsx", sheet = 3, col_names = TRUE)
```

crop
```{r}
crops1 <- crops %>%
  unite("Rotation", OI_2013:PV_2032, sep = "_", na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}

crops3 <- crops1 %>%
  group_by(Depto...8) %>%
  count(Rotation, sort = TRUE) %>%
  top_n(5)

```

```{r}
crops4 <- crops1 %>%
  filter(Tolerancia == 7) %>%
  count(Rotation, sort = TRUE)
```



```{r}
crops5 <- crops1 %>%
  filter(Tenedor == "Si") %>%
  count(Rotation, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
crops6 <- crops1 %>%
  filter(Tenedor == "No") %>%
  count(Rotation, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
crops7 <- crops1 %>%
  filter(`Plan modificado? 1= SI` == 1) %>%
  count(Rotation, sort = TRUE)

```



```{r}
crops7 <- crops1 %>%
  filter(`Plan modificado? 1= SI` == 1) %>%
  group_by(`Depto...8`, Tenedor, )
```
